tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bicycle_models (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    frame_material VARCHAR(50),
    wheel_size INT,
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE bicycle_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE model_specs (
    spec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    wheel_size DECIMAL(5, 2),
    frame_material VARCHAR(255),
    color VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES bicycle_models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE model_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES bicycle_models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE bicycle_models (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    brand VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE bike_specifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    frame_material VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    wheel_size INT,
    color VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE bike_sales (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE BicycleModels (
    model_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    brand VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    year INTEGER,
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Specifications (
    spec_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INTEGER REFERENCES BicycleModels(model_id),
    color VARCHAR(20),
    weight DECIMAL(6,2),
    size VARCHAR(10)
);
